pr_title: feat(auth): Adds user info to sign up result

timeline.message: Adds user info to sign up result

timeline.author: eeatonaws

timeline.bodyText: In the JavaDoc comment for the AuthSignUpResult constructor, it says the user will be null if isSignUpComplete is false, but here you're passing in a non-null AuthUser and false for isSignUpComplete. When creating this new AuthSignUpResult here, should you either pass in true for isSignUpComplete or null for the user?
timeline.author: eeatonaws

replies.bodyText: Good point - I'll add null for the user
replies.author: TrekSoft
